Html:
Is this still an active project?

Is there an db upgrade path, our would I have to write that myself?

Does someone have this version up and running so I could see it in action?

Thanks

Richard

I would also like to know if this is still an active project...I'm just now starting to use it but I'd like to know if there is still any support happening around this.  Thanks,

Randy

Looks like it is a dead project. Quite a shame I liked the first version and was looking forward to upgrading. Had started with the new version but did not want to re-invent the wheel.

Richard
